Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: The vast Military Headquarters overshadows you as you walk along Hofton.
Room.LongDescription: You have reached the western edge of the great Military Headquarters on the north side of the road. The building must extend nearly two city blocks as you can't see the eastern end of the building no matter how hard you look. The Headquarters is the central controlling body for the Oceancrest defenses.
